# ***Online multiplayer chat*** :pencil:

## What are the options for online chat?
- [X] Chat for endless number of users
- [X] The ability to watch online users in real time
- [X] The ability to see all messages of users
- [X] Consider the time of the received letter
___

### *Installation instructions*
1. To implement chat on your computer clone project from GitHub [by clicking here](https://github.com/)
2. Install locale server
3. Project opening
___
